SEARCH
Package io.github.chichizhang0510.duration

Class Duration

java.lang.Object
io.github.chichizhang0510.duration.Duration
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Duration>
public final class Duration extends Object implements Comparable<Duration>
A duration represents a period of time. It is immutable and thread-safe.

  • Constructor Details

    • Duration

      public Duration(String input)
      Parses a human-readable duration string (e.g. "2h30m", "1d 12h", "-90s").
      Parameters:
      input - duration string
      Throws:
      InvalidDurationFormatException - if the input is not a valid duration format
